name: Billy and the Kid
description:
One evening when Billy was done with work, he noticed that one of his goats had wandered off into the cursed forest.

Billy searched and searched until he came upon a clearing.

There was his goat!

But it was getting late, and the ghosts would be out soon. Billy quickly built fires near all the roads into the clearing.

He will have to be quick and keep his fires alive with his torch. If they die out completely, Billy will be left alone in the dark.

Protect your goat!

Use WASD or the Arrow keys to move around
Spacebar or Left-click to attack
Shift or Right-click to jump
